item.description:
Hi Packers & Merry Christmas,

Wishing all of Boston Packer nation a great holiday season and best wishes for the 2012 new year. This week The Pack are taking on Detroit in the last regular season game before the play offs start, we will be meeting at The Banshee on the 2nd floor for the game, kick off time is 1.00pm, as always any suggestions or feed back welcome, for those of you still away enjoy the game wherever you are, see you for the playoffs. GO PACK.

Best,

Ray Butler

group.name: The Boston Green Bay Packers Meetup Group

item.name: Detriot @ Green Bay
